name: Square Brawl
description: A fast and skill based party game where all of the focus lies in fun and engaging gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 Processor: 2GHz Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Great little game! Basically a ranged Smash Bros. Tons of fun to play with friends.  Still has several bugs, but the dev is very responsive
Great for local multiplayer, everyone is constantly laughing.
It would be a nice game if free, and if it was multiplayer....

A really perfect, enjoyable and simple game...  BUT  bugs here and there, a lot of areas that can be improved on would make this game worth. Do i recommend it? Maybe, but only if you have friends locally since there isn't an online multiplayer. (cough) (cough) PLEASE CREATE ONE SOON (cough) (cough) And also do us, players, a favor. GIVE WHAT WE WANT. jk. But seriously, we want more things from this AWESOME(almost) game.
Great game for couch gaming with friends! I especially like the diverse weapon variety and minimalistic artstyle.

This game is amazing for its price, you can have hours of fun just against the bots, with loads of weapons to choose from, a large variety of maps, as well as a map editor. There are numerous game modes, and other options including health regen, double speed, etc. Face up to 3 enemy bots with difficulty levels ranging from easy to godmode.

way too buggy, when friends are over I'll always play a different game. This is because of the many bugs, I like gameplay. When I pause the game I can't unpause unless i click the button with my mouse.
